text: Juan David Ramírez Bolívar (born 9 January 1997) is a Colombian footballer who currently plays as a goalkeeper for Austin Bold, on loan from Atlético Nacional. Ramírez was at the Atlético Nacional youth set-up from 2013 until he made his debut for the first team in 2016. He made no more appearances for the first team until going on loan in 2019.
